videos.description: Damian Lillard drops off a pass to Jusuf Nurkic under the basket for an easy flush on the inside for the Trail Blazers.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Lillard sets up Nurkic for easy inside finish) 2021/05/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lillard sets up Nurkic for easy inside finish

videos.description: Damian Lillard sauces up multiple defenders and drops a dime to Enes Kanter for an easy two-handed flush inside.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Kanter raises the roof after easy dunk) 2021/05/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kanter raises the roof after easy dunk
